text: The 2019 NCAA Division II Women's Basketball Tournament involved 64 teams playing in a single-elimination tournament to determine the NCAA Division II women's college basketball national champion. It began on March 15, 2019, and concluded with the championship game on March 29, 2019. The first three rounds were hosted by top-seeded teams in regional play. The eight regional winners met for the quarterfinal and semifinals, better known as the "Elite Eight" and "Final Four" respectively, and National Championship game at Alumni Hall in Columbus, Ohio. In the title game, Lubbock Christian defeated Southwestern Oklahoma State in double overtime to win their second Division II championship. ==Bracket== ===Atlantic Regional=== * – Denotes overtime period ===Central Regional=== ===East Regional=== ===Midwest Regional=== ===South Regional=== ===Southeast Regional=== * – Denotes overtime period ===South Central Regional=== * – Denotes overtime period ===West Regional=== ===Finals=== Quarterfinals, semifinals and finals were hosted at Alumni Hall in Columbus, Ohio. Regional winners are reseeded in the quarterfinals. ** – Denotes double-overtime period ==References== Category:NCAA Division II Women's Basketball Tournament NCAA Tournament NCAA Category:Sports competitions in Columbus, Ohio
title: 2019 NCAA Division II Women's Basketball Tournament
